content: Is there a more efficient way to get all the subscribers to a stream than getting all users in the org with /users followed by a check for each user to see if they're subscribed to the stream of interest with /users/{user_id}/subscriptions/{stream_id}? I'm not sure I'm seeing something more direct at a quick glance but maybe I'm missing something.
@Noe Martinez you can probably do it with https://zulipchat.com/api/register-queue using include_subscribers=true; I think there's also soon to be a .../members endpoint.

Thanks for the tip. @Ian Henckel also found that https://zulipchat.com/api/get-subscriptions has the subscribers list in the response, so if the client user is subscribed to the stream of interest, that works as well for now.
Glad to hear there's a first class endpoint coming though!
Yes, that will do it as well.
